policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.content1: This site does not collect any personal information. No names, emails, or contact details are stored, and you can use the site freely without logging in.
policy.content2: Some settings (e.g., quiz progress) are stored in your browser's local storage. This site uses Google Analytics to anonymously collect visitor traffic. No personally identifiable information such as advertising IDs is collected. External links (e.g., Google Sites, GitHub Pages) follow their own privacy policies. This site is not responsible for data collection by external sites.

characterQuiz.title: Reverse: 1999 Character Quiz
characterQuiz.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset?
characterQuiz.resetDescription: All correct answers and quiz progress will be lost.
characterQuiz.basicRulesText1: - Guess character names from Reverse: 1999 without any hints.
characterQuiz.basicRulesText2: - Based on version {version}, includes all characters from 2‚òÖ to 6‚òÖ.
characterQuiz.basicRulesText3: - Names are based on in-game names. Spacing is ignored.
characterQuiz.basicRulesText4: - Try to name all characters as quickly as possible.
characterQuiz.basicRulesText7: - Timer starts from first correct answer to last.
characterQuiz.buttonDescText2: - Give Up immediately reveals all characters with your time.
characterQuiz.buttonDescText4: - Filter provides helpful hints for solving.
characterQuiz.postscriptText1: - Reverse veterans should try Hard Mode.
characterQuiz.postscriptText2: - Mobile users, please use desktop mode!
characterQuiz.postscriptText3: - Desktop play recommended for best experience.
characterQuiz.gaveUpMsg2: A little more practice and you'll be a great Timekeeper
characterQuiz.hardModeDesc1: - Spacing and capitalization must be exact.
characterQuiz.hardModeDesc2: - Activating Hard Mode starts a new game.
characterQuiz.hardModeDesc3: - Auto-shuffle enabled. Filters and Give Up disabled.
characterQuiz.hardModeDesc4: - Hard Mode cannot be disabled until reset or refresh.

damageCalc.title: Damage Calculator
damageCalc.termAFormula: A = max(Final ATK - Final DEF, Final ATK √ó 10%)
damageCalc.termBFormula: B = max(1 + DMG Bonus + DMG Dealt + Enemy DMG Taken - DMG Reduction, 30%)
damageCalc.termCFormula: C = max(130% + CRIT Conversion + CRIT DMG% - CRIT DEF + CRIT DEF Reduction, 110%)
damageCalc.termEFormula: E = Base Coeff + Additional DMG Coeff + Extra ATK Coeff
damageCalc.formulaDesc: Accurate damage calculation formula for Reverse: 1999.
damageCalc.completeFormulaText: Final Damage = (Character ATK - Enemy DEF √ó (1 - DEF Ignore Rate) √ó (1 - DEF Reduction Rate)) √ó (Skill Multiplier) √ó (1 + DMG Increase Rate + DMG Taken Increase - Enemy DMG Reduction) √ó (1 + Incantation/Ritual Power) √ó (CRIT DMG - Enemy CRIT DEF) √ó 1.3 if element advantage
damageCalc.step1Text: Effective DEF = Target DEF √ó (1 - DEF Ignore Rate) √ó (1 - DEF Reduction Rate)
damageCalc.step1Note1: DEF Ignore and DEF Reduction are entered as % (e.g. 15% = 15)
damageCalc.step1Note2: Choose between Reality DEF or Mental DEF
damageCalc.step3Note: Skill coefficient is the skill multiplier (e.g. 100% = 100, 200% = 200)
damageCalc.step4Text: Damage = Damage √ó (1 + DMG Increase + DMG Taken Increase - DMG Reduction)
damageCalc.step4Note2: DMG Taken Increase: Attacker's DMG Dealt Increase (or Defender's DMG Taken Reduction)
damageCalc.step4Note4: All three values are summed together
damageCalc.step5Note: Choose between Incantation Power or Ritual Power
damageCalc.step7Text: Final Damage = Damage √ó (CRIT Damage - CRIT DEF) / 100
damageCalc.warning1: All % values are calculated as decimals (15% = 0.15)
damageCalc.warning2: DEF Ignore and DEF Reduction are applied multiplicatively
damageCalc.warning3: DMG Bonus and DMG Dealt are different stats
damageCalc.warning4: Final damage cannot be less than 0
